inclusion.criterion: Severe symptomatic aortic stenosis defined as aortic valve area (AVA) ≤1.0 cm2 and/or ≥40 mmHg (echocardiography)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Severe symptomatic aortic stenosis defined as aortic valve area (AVA) ≤1.0 cm2 and/or ≥40 mmHg (echocardiography)
inclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis and concomitant coronary artery disease, accepted for TAVI and PCI by a multidisciplinary Heart Team. He also underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
